sentences.en: A wide base will make the structure much more stable.
sentences.cn: 宽大的底座会使结构牢固许多。

sentences.en: As chief executive, he assembled a polished stable of celebrities.
sentences.cn: 作为首席执行官，他手下云集了一批优雅的名人名士。

sentences.en: Doctors said his condition was serious but stable.
sentences.cn: 医生说他的病情很严重，但还算稳定。

sentences.en: He was not emotionally stable enough to think through his decision.
sentences.cn: 他情绪不够稳定,不能清楚地考虑他的决定.

sentences.en: I used stable muck as a mulch for my roses.
sentences.cn: 我用厩肥做我玫瑰的护根.

sentences.en: I'm glad she has become such a stable character.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴她变得如此沉稳.

sentences.en: Miss Curling won on two horses from Mick Trickey's stable.
sentences.cn: 柯林小姐在来自米克·特里齐养马场的两匹马身上下了注，结果她赢了。

sentences.en: Our stable abuts against his dwelling.
sentences.cn: 我们的马厩和他的住所毗连。

sentences.en: The less stable compounds were converted into a compound called Delta-A THC.
sentences.cn: 不太稳定的化合物被转换成了一种叫做Delta-ATHC的化合物。

sentences.en: The mare has just thrown a foal in the stable.
sentences.cn: 那匹母马刚刚在马厩里产下了一只小马驹.

sentences.en: The prices of the commodities are quite stable this year.
sentences.cn: 今年各种物价相当稳定.

sentences.en: The soldiers violated the church by using it as a stable.
sentences.cn: 士兵们把教堂当马厩,亵渎了教堂.

sentences.en: Their characters are fully formed and they are both very stable children.
sentences.cn: 他们的性格已经完全形成，两人都是非常持重的孩子。

sentences.en: They found Trish sitting on the cobbles of the stable yard.
sentences.cn: 他们发现翠茜坐在场院的鹅卵石地上。

sentences.en: This ladder doesn't seem very stable.

sentences.cn: 这一结构必须得很稳固。

sentences.en: We'vegot stable labor, decreasing interest rates, low oil prices.
sentences.cn: 我们拥有稳定的劳力、不断降低的利率以及低廉的石油价格。

words.tran_cn: [助剂] 稳定剂；稳定器；安定装置
使…坚固；使…安定；装稳定器（等于stablize）

phrases.tran_cn: 情况稳定；稳定条件；稳定状态

trans.tran_en: steady and not likely to move or change

trans.tran_cn: 马厩，养马场，统称某人拥有赛马，一群人
trans.tran_en: a building where horses are kept
to put or keep a horse in a stable
